author: Olivia Petter, Olivia Petter
title: Coronavirus: Airbnb offers free accommodation to NHS workers
description: 'By working together, we can ensure that frontline workers can find a free and convenient place to stay as they continue their critical work,' says Airbnb
content:
Airbnb is offering NHS workers free accommodation during the coronavirus outbreak.
Hosts on the home rental website have agreed to waive all fees associated with stays at their properties to support medical staff on the frontline of the pandemic, with roughl… [+1894 chars]
